description.p: The Signature Editor lets you capture a handwritten signature drawn on the screen with a finger or stylus.

If the field does not already have a signature as a value, accessing the Signature Editor will display a yellow area centered vertically on the screen in which to write. When done writing, tap the *[Done]* button at the bottom of the screen to commit the value and return to the form details. To *[erase]* what you have written and start with a blank signature, tap the [eraser] eraser button at the bottom of the screen.
When entering a signature, swiping left or right on the white areas above and below the signature area will commit the value and then change to the next/previous field's editor.

If you display the Signature Editor when the field already has a signature value, the signature and timestamp will be displayed towards the top of the editor screen. Double-tapping on an existing signature will erase the value and display the signature writing area.
You may also use the [delete] delete button at the bottom of the screen to delete the current field value.
When previewing a signature, swiping left or right on the editor screen will change to the next/previous field's editor.
